ARABIC: لَّوْ مَا تَأْتِينَا بِٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Why do you not bring angels to us if you are telling the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If you are a man of truth, why can't you bring the angels to us?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Why do you not bring down angels upon us if you are indeed truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Why do you not bring down the angels if what you say is true".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Why do you not bring angels to us, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Why do you not bring angels to us if you are of the truthful"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Why do you not bring to us the angels if you are of the truthful ones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Why dost thou not bring the angels unto us, if thou speakest truly?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Why bringest thou not angels unto us, if thou art of the truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Why do you not bring down the angels upon us, if you are truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Why bringest thou not angels unto us if thou art of the truthtellers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Why do you not bring us the angels should you be truthful?!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Why bringest thou not angels to us if it be that thou hast the Truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Why do you not bring angels to us if you are of the truthful ones?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Why do you not bring down the angels, if what you say is true'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:7] Why do you not bring us the angels, if you are of the truthful?’, in saying that you are a prophet and that this Qur’ān is from God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Why bringest thou not angels unto Us) from heaven so that they bear witness that you are Allah's Messenger, (if thou art of the truthful?) in what you say.
